Row.Text: As part of a plot to overthrow the Medici from power, the Pazzi family attempted to assassinate Lorezo and Giuliano de' Medici during High Mass at the Duomo before a crowd of 10,000. While Giuliano was killed, Lorenzo managed to escape with serious, but non life-threatening wounds. The enraged crowd of Florentines turned upon the conspirators, killing them.
The people must be thanked for their loyalty.
This matter must be properly investigated.

The people have been thanked for their loyalty to the Medici family after a failed assassination attempt.
Additional guards have been hired after a failed assassination attempt.
An investigation of the Pazzi family and others involved in the conspiracy to overthrow the Medici has been launched after a failed assassination attempt.

We stand at the dawn of a new Golden Age; a reinvigoration of philosophy and art. Many of the wealthier nobles and merchants are already supporting the promising artists of this new era. Should we not follow their example pledge to support our people in their cultural endeavours?
Our finances must be properly managed; we cannot spend so frivolously.
I pledge my support! Let the Arts flourish!
